flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Most hazardous chemicals commonly used in industry are lethal. Why risk your employees’ life when you can alert them beforehand with a clear chemical label. Buy the best NFPA labels, HazMat labels, GHS labels, MSDS labels and hazardous waste labels from ChemicalLabels. Don’t find a suitable label? You can design a label yourself. Customization has no extra charges.

ChemicalLabels is one of the largest stores of SmartSign – the leaders of signs, labels, tags and mats in America. The online store is committed to offering premium quality, fully compliant and durable labels. Look through the website for industry-best hazardous waste labels, NFPA labels, HMIS & HMIG labels, HazMat labels, GHS labels, and MSDS labels. Acetone, Phosphorous, Uranium or Sodium - the store offers about 130 pre-printed ANSI labels with a chemical name in the title. For specific hazard communication, you can also use custom chemical labels offered at no extra charges for customization.

guide.summary: Chemicallabels.com serves up a variety of in-stock and customized chemical identification and hazard labels. Find premium quality OSHA chemical labels, NFPA stickers, MSDS labels and more at unbeatable prices on the Web.
guide.title: Chemical Safety Labels
